action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ X X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid where X's form a border around the edges, with additional X's in the interior forming a partial diagonal line from top-left to bottom-right.

Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:

DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid where X's form a border on the left side and partial borders on the top and bottom. The right side has X's in the top and bottom two rows. The middle is mostly empty squares.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid where X's form a border around the edges, with additional X's in the interior forming a partial diagonal line from top-left to bottom-right.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is there an X in the second column, second row of your grid?
